id.description: The unique identifier of this demographic answer option.

free_form.description: Specifies if the answer option allows for free-form input in addition to predefined options.

active.description: Indicates whether this demographic answer option is active or not.

name.description: The name or label of the demographic answer option.

demographic_question_id.description: The unique identifier of the demographic question associated with this answer option.

translations.description: List of translations for the name of the demographic answer option in different languages.

language.description: The language code of the translation.

name.description: The translated name of the demographic answer option in the respective language.
